mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_bbs(review_title, review_score, snack_id, review_content, review_img, member_id) VALUES(#{review_title}, #{review_score}, #{snack_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{member_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE review_bbs SET review_title = #{review_title}, review_score = #{review_score}, snack_id = #{snack_id}, review_content = #{review_content}, review_img = #{review_img} WHERE review_id = #{review_id}
mapper.select: select review_id, review_img, review_title, review_score, snack_id, member_id, create_dt from review_bbs WHERE review_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHERE snack_id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHERE member_id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by review_id desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
